name: Duty of police officer to owner
text: [§52D-12]  Duty of police officer to owner.  Any stolen or lost property in the custody of a police officer shall be delivered to its owner or the owner's duly authorized agent upon satisfactory proof of ownership, and if to an agent, of the agency; subject to payment by the owner or agent of all reasonable expenses incurred in the preservation and safekeeping of the property. [L 1989, c 136, pt of §2]
